root.name: Dance Dance Revolution 4thMIX
root.description: OverviewDance Dance Revolution 4thMIX (usually shortened to DDR 4th Mix) is the fourth game in the Dance Dance Revolution franchise.The game received several releases in the arcades. In December 2000, an upgraded version of the game titled Dance Dance Revolution 4thMIX Plus was released. It features fourteen new songs and altered charts on Maniac difficulty to provide extra challenge for players.SoundtrackThe arcade and home versions have different songs available. In the arcade version, the songs were displayed in different categories with several songs overlapping, which is why some are listed multiple times. Since 4thMIX Plus includes all the songs from the standard version, only the new songs are listed.Arcade (Japan) Cover ClassicsSong TitleArtistBasicTrickManiacBad GirlsJuliet Roberts245Boom Boom DollarKing Kong D.Jungle Girls256Eat You UpAngie Gold256El Ritmo TropicalDixies Gang267Flashdance (What a Feeling)Magika478Furuhata's ThemeCJ Crew feat.
